Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc26.model.player

Class Hand

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc26.model.player.Hand
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Hand extends Object implements Serializable
This class represents the current hand for a player
